#labels Featured
<pre>

Crapculates current line in editor.

Variables:
 Names: $a .. $z
 Assignment: $a := expression ;

Crapculator:
 Syntax: ( ) d.d
 Constants: e pi
 Binary: ^ `*` / % - +
 Unary: - + sqrt ln log sin cos tan rad deg floor ceil frac fac
 Line may end with "=".

Hackulator:
 Syntax: ( ) d 0xh IPv4
 Binary: `*` / % - + >> << & ^ |
 Unary: - + ~
 Line may end with:
 "=" for  hex,
 "=d" for decimal,
 "=u" for unsigned decimal
 "=4" for IPv4 address.
</pre>
